document_data.name: Jerbollah
document_data.mainbody: '''Jerbollah''' was a [[dwarf]] [[cleric]] of [[Moradin]] in [[Mithral Hall]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: While Jerbollah was strong in magic, many of the other clerics of Mithral Hall poked fun at him and enjoyed slapping him on the back of this head.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], King Bruenor held trials to replace the deceased [[Cobble]] as Holy Cleric of the Hall. [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] awarded Jerbollah a seven out of ten for his brewing of [[mead]] dwarven [[holy water]]. With the coming of the [[Time of Troubles]], Jerbollah turned his face red instead of casting a red ''[[light]]'' spell.
